NTT DATA Services currently seeks a Business Data Analyst to join our team in Charlotte, North Carolina (US-NC), United States (US).

(To qualify must be a US Citizen or Permanent Resident and located in Charlotte, NC)

POSITION SUMMARY
The Business Data Analyst uses business and technology knowledge to serve as a liaison between business initiatives and IT in order to determine the correct course of action to achieve desired results. This person collaborates with business and technical resources to determine business information and application needs and assists clients in the analysis of a proposed idea and performs the review, determines the systems potential, conducts documentation, testing (as needed) and follow through.

RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Analysis and Solution Definition
  • Analyzes business requirements to understand the business needs and to determine how the application can best function to fulfill those needs.
  • Identifies cross impact to other systems.
  • Performs data analysis and provides documentation of results
  • Proposes solutions to problems and considers timeliness, effectiveness, and practicality in addressing client needs.
Project Execution
  • Adheres to and facilitates project standards.
  • Creates, consolidates and presents documents relating to use cases, functional requirements, data mapping, privilege provisioning and authorization models, maintaining them throughout the project, including traceability back to requirements.
  • Provides a business or process perspective during design reviews.
  • Establishes responsible deadlines and personal work plans and manages time effectively.
  • Participates in change control process throughout the project.
  • Contributes to continuous improvement and proactively supports knowledge sharing within the team and across Technology.
  • Proactively carries out project support /administrative functions.
Communication & Teamwork
  • Listens to others and accepts input from team members.
  • Clearly articulates ideas and thoughts verbally.
  • Accurately prepares written business correspondence that is coherent, grammatically correct, effective and professional.
  • Demonstrates flexibility in day-to-day work.
  • Establishes harmonious working relationships with team members; appreciates each team member's contributions and values each individual member.
  • Values internal and external clients and responds to their needs as they arise.
  • Establishes effective working relationship with clients; uses good judgment in what and how to communicate with clients.
SKILLS REQUIRED
  • Working knowledge of VBA
  • Must have strong knowledge of MS Office Suite - specifically Excel and Access
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
  • Bachelor's degree
  • 3+ years of experience as a Business Analyst working in a Financial Services environment
